This is to fulfill the requirements of Coursera's Exploratory Data Analysis Project 1. To run the scripts, conduct the following steps:

1. Download and unzip the data set from https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/exdata%2Fdata%2Fhousehold_power_consumption.zip into your working directory.

2. Run each plot**n**.R file separately.
